item.title: Report X-2024020020
item.description:
Report X-2024020020

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: MONTGOMERY
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO PACKAGE WEARING PROPER PPE, DECISION TREE IN HAND. RESPONDER NOTICED PACKAGE LEAKING PROFUSELY ON BED OF TRAILER. USING APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER CONTAINED LEAKER AND TRANSPORTED TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
